meta.content: Stillwater Public Schools; a tradition of high expectations, standards, great achievements, reputation for excellence across state and nation, wide variety of opportunities for students, while maintaining a personal, caring and personalized education.

h3.a: Schools closed, Distance learning through May 4

div.p: The Governor has ordered all Minnesota schools to remain closed with distance learning in place from March 30 through May 4 to help slow the spread of the COVID-19 virus.

© 2020 Stillwater Area Public Schools Privacy Policy

Serving the communities of Afton, Bayport, Baytown Township, Grant, Hugo, Lake Elmo, Lakeland, Lakeland Shores, Lake St. Croix Beach, Marine on St. Croix, May Township, Oak Park Heights, St. Mary's Point, Stillwater, Stillwater Township, West Lakeland Township, Withrow and Woodbury.
